text: The Man Without Love () is a 1929 French-German silent drama film directed by Guido Brignone and starring Gustav Diessl, Ágnes Eszterházy, and Harry Hardt. It is based on the play Kean by Alexandre Dumas. The film's sets were designed by Heinrich Richter. ==Cast== ==References== ==Bibliography== * ==External links== * Category:1929 films Category:French films Category:German films Category:Films of the Weimar Republic Category:Films directed by Guido Brignone Category:German silent feature films Category:French silent feature films Category:German drama films Category:French drama films Category:1929 drama films Category:Films about actors Category:Films based on works by Alexandre Dumas Category:German black-and-white films Category:French black- and-white films
title: The Man Without Love
